name: ASUS ProArt PA32DC OLED
description: 32-inch OLED reference monitor with built-in colorimeter for auto-calibration. Features 99% DCI-P3, true 10-bit color, and Delta E <1 accuracy for color-critical work.

reviews.review_text: Built-in colorimeter is genius. Always accurate.
OLED for professional color work. Finally.
Premium price but essential for professional work.
